sentence_zh_TW: 許多人認為這部電影是科幻類型中的終極之作，因為它改變了觀眾對這個類別的看法。
sentence: Many consider this film to be the ______ masterpiece of the sci-fi genre as it changed how audiences perceive this category.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位記者調查了許多檔案，最終揭示了政府隱藏的重大真相，震驚了全國。
sentence: The journalist dug through numerous files to ______ significant truths hidden by the government, shocking the nation.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個訓練計劃中，選手們必須經歷一系列嚴格的測試，以評估他們的能力。
sentence: In this training program, participants must ______ a series of rigorous tests to assess their abilities.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了獲得學位，本科生必須完成多門課程，這是一段充滿挑戰的學習歷程。
sentence: To earn a degree, an ______ must complete numerous courses, marking a challenging educational journey.

sentence_zh_TW: 教師在作業中用紅筆強調重要的部分，以幫助學生更好地理解關鍵概念。
sentence: The teacher used a red pen to ______ important parts in the assignment to help students better understand key concepts.

sentence_zh_TW: 持續的負面評論可能會削弱任何領導者的信譽，這對團隊的士氣造成影響。
sentence: Continuous negative comments can ______ any leader's credibility, impacting the morale of the team.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個非營利組織決定承擔一個大規模的社區工程，以改善當地的基礎設施。
sentence: This nonprofit organization decided to ______ a large-scale community project to improve local infrastructure.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了修正這個錯誤，使用軟體的撤銷功能可以幫助你輕鬆回到之前的狀態。
sentence: To correct this mistake, using the software's ______ function can help you easily revert to a previous state.

sentence_zh_TW: 這場表演毫無疑問地吸引了觀眾的注意，並在社交媒體上獲得了大量的分享。
sentence: This performance attracted the audience's attention ______ and gained extensive shares on social media.

sentence_zh_TW: 在經濟衰退期間，失業率往往上升，導致許多家庭面臨財務困難。
sentence: During economic downturns, the rate of ______ often rises, leading many families to face financial difficulties.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個故事的情節會隨著時間的推移而展開，讓讀者漸漸了解角色間的複雜關係。
sentence: The plot of this story will ______ over time, gradually revealing the complex relationships among the characters.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個新應用程式能幫助用戶解鎖他們設備中的新功能，提升使用體驗。
sentence: This new application can help users ______ new features in their devices, enhancing their experience.

sentence_zh_TW: 這次創新帶來的變化對行業而言是前所未有的，無法預測未來的發展。
sentence: The changes brought by this innovation are ______ for the industry, making it impossible to predict future developments.

sentence_zh_TW: 在每次軟體版本的更新後，用戶都會收到通知，以便他們下載最新的功能。
sentence: After each software version ______, users receive a notification to download the latest features.

sentence_zh_TW: 這款手機的升級版本擁有更快的處理器和更好的相機，吸引了大量顧客。
sentence: The upgraded version of this phone features a faster processor and better camera, attracting many customers.

sentence_zh_TW: 公用事業公司提供的水電服務對我們的日常生活至關重要，讓我們能夠享有現代便利。
sentence: The water and electricity services provided by ______ companies are essential for our daily lives, allowing us to enjoy modern conveniences.

sentence_zh_TW: 有效的時間管理能幫助人們更好地利用資源，達成目標。
sentence: Effective time management can help people better ______ resources to achieve their goals.

sentence_zh_TW: 在真空環境中，聲音無法傳播，這是因為空氣的缺乏。
sentence: In a ______ environment, sound cannot travel due to the absence of air.

sentence_zh_TW: 在解釋這個概念時，過於模糊的描述會使聽眾感到困惑，影響理解。
sentence: When explaining this concept, ______ descriptions can confuse the audience and hinder understanding.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了確保結果的可靠性，實驗必須在有效的條件下進行，以獲得正確的數據。
sentence: To ensure the reliability of results, experiments must be conducted under ______ conditions to obtain accurate data.
